category: Articles of Incorporation/Article 12 (Appointment and Dismissal of Officers)
contents: Article 12 (Appointment and dismissal of officers) ① The Chairman of the Board is appointed by the President upon the recommendation of the Minister of Education from among those recommended by the Executive Recommendation Committee. ② The Executive Director is appointed by the Chairman of the Board. ③ The Non-standing Director is appointed by the Executive Recommendation Committee. The Minister of Education appoints from among those recommended by multiple people. In this case, among workers belonging to the foundation who have been employed for more than 3 years (referring to workers under Article 2 (1) 1 of the Labor Standards Act; hereinafter the same shall apply), the worker representative (if there is a labor union organized by a majority of workers, the representative of that labor union) It must include one person recommended by (referring to the representative) or with the consent of a majority of workers. Revised August 17, 2022. ④ Notwithstanding paragraph 3, the following persons shall of course become directors (hereinafter referred to as *ex officio directors). Revised August 17, 2022. 1. One person nominated by the Minister of Education from among the public officials under his/her office, 2. One person nominated by the Minister of Strategy and Finance from among the public officials under his/her office, 3. One person nominated by the Chairman of the Financial Services Commission from among public officials under his/her office. One person, ⑤ The auditor is appointed by the President upon the recommendation of the Minister of Strategy and Finance from among those recommended by the Executive Recommendation Committee and reviewed and resolved by the Public Institution Steering Committee. Revised 2020. 11. 5., 2022. 8. 17.. ⑥ Necessary matters regarding the operation, review standards, and other procedures of the Executive Recommendation Committee shall be determined in separate regulations after resolution by the Board of Directors. Revised November 5, 2020, August 17, 2022, ⑦ The term of office of the Chairman of the Board shall be three years, and the terms of office of Directors and Auditors shall be two years, but each may be reappointed in one-year increments. Revised August 17, 2022. ⑧ Reappointment under paragraph 7 shall be determined by the appointing authority. Revised 2022. 8. 17.
